entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High 11.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with a few showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Local amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 60 early this morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
